text: Nhung nguoi co đuc tin khong đuoc phep lay nhung ke vo đuc tin lam nhung nguoi bao ho thay vi nhung nguoi co đuc tin. Nguoi nao lam vay thi Allah hoan toan vo can voi y ngoai tru truong hop cac nguoi lo so cac moi hoa tu ho. Allah canh bao cac nguoi ve ban than Ngai. Qua that, cac nguoi phai tro ve trinh dien Allah
